main event: On 3rd January 1956, a civilian at Chanute AFB, Illinois, reported seeing a red light change to green at approximately 2000 feet.
interesting points: The sighting took place at night, around 10:25 PM.
The report mentions that the UFO was airborne-visual and seen at an altitude of 4200 feet, moving at a speed of 280 knots.
Despite a search of the general area, no evidence of the UFO was found.
The observation was made by a civilian whose name is unknown.
The report states 'insufficient data for evaluation' indicating a lack of detailed information.
sighted object: red to green light at approximately 2000 feet
